title: Central Park Playground Cleanup
description: After a festival, the playground was left in disarray. Our heroes restored it to shining form.

title: 5th St Warehouse Graffiti Removal
description: A vandalized facade needed a swift rescue. Solvents, scrubs, and heroic elbow grease.

title: Riverside Park Litter Sweep
description: Windy weekend left debris across trails. Community-powered cleanup underway.

title: Old Town Alley Deep Clean
description: A tight alleyway needed degreasing and pressure washing to make it safe again.

title: Community Center Reopen Prep
description: Top-to-bottom clean before reopening day. Floors, glass, kitchens—cinematic finish.

title: After-Parade Street Refresh
description: Confetti and cups everywhere—our squad restores order faster than a speeding bullet.
